thread.section_title: Humura Resorts - UPDATED 2017 Resort Reviews & Price Comparison (Kampala, Uganda) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Kampala Getaway
thread.title_full: Kampala Getaway - Review of Humura Resorts, Kampala, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: kamfamily
title: Kampala Getaway
text:
We found the staff here to be very friendly and very accommodating. The breakfast buffet each morning is good and can be supplemented by ordering eggs from the kitchen. The rooms are clean and the resort is quiet despite being located off a main road. Our room backed onto the golf course and was particularly quiet.
Our one disappointment is that the pool was closed for maintenance during our stay (up and running on the day we left).
Humura is centrally located and just a short ride by Ã¼ber to downtown Kampala.
We particularly enjoyed our servers Dennis and James who were particularly helpful and friendly.
